Package com.j2igf.framework.graphics.auxiliary

Class SpriteSheet

java.lang.Object
com.j2igf.framework.graphics.auxiliary.SpriteSheet
public class SpriteSheet extends Object
A class that represents a Sprite sheet.
Author:
Aryan Rai

    • SpriteSheet

      public SpriteSheet (Sprite src, int numberOfSpritesHorizontally, int numberOfSpritesVertically)
      This is the constructor for the SpriteSheet class.
      Parameters:
      src - The source sprite.
      numberOfSpritesHorizontally - The number of sprites horizontally.
      numberOfSpritesVertically - The number of sprites vertically.

  • Method Details

    • getSprite

      public Sprite getSprite (int index, boolean verticalScan)
      This method returns a sprite from the sprite sheet.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the sprite.
      verticalScan - If true, the sprite will be returned by scanning vertically.
      Returns:
      The sprite at the specified index in the sprite sheet.

    • getSprite

      public Sprite getSprite (int x, int y)
      This method returns a sprite from the sprite sheet.
      Parameters:
      x - The x coordinate of the sprite.
      y - The y coordinate of the sprite.
      Returns:
      The sprite at the specified coordinates in the sprite sheet.
